Package starvationevasion.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constant
    This class contains all constant values used throughout the Starvation Evasion game.
    GeographicArea  
    MapPoint
    Simple data class for specifying a location on the Earth's Surface.
    MapProjectionMollweide  
    RegionData
    This structure contains all data of a particular region that the simulator shares with each client via the Server.
    SpecialEventData  
    Tuple<T,U>
    Shea Polansky Simple generic 2-Tuple class
    Util
    public static methods that might be useful in as utilities.
    VoteData  
    WorldData
    This structure is populated and returned by the Simulator.nextTurn(ArrayList) method.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Constant.Month
    Month names in calendar order where:
    .ordinal() is the month number -1,
    .name() is the three letter abbreviation of the month,
    .full() returns the full name of the month, and
    .days() returns the number of days in the month as used by the simulator (in the simulator, including leap years, February has 28 days).
    EnumCropZone  
    EnumFood
    The game models the following 12 farm product categories.

    All farm products throughout the world used for food, animal feed and/or biofuel are modeled as belonging to one of the above 12 categories.

    Farm products not modeled include Lumber, Cotton, and Wool.
    EnumRegion
    Enumerates each of the geographic regions used in the game: both Player and non-Player regions.

    The ordinal of US regions are continuous and less than all non-Player world regions.
    EnumSpecialEvent
    Defines types of possible special events.
    GeographicArea.BoundaryType  
    SpecialEventData.EnumSpecialEvent
